scripts.seed:doctors: node -e "require('./config/database'); const Doctor=require('./models/Doctor'); (async()=>{await Doctor.deleteMany({}); await Doctor.insertMany([{fullName:'Dr. Sara Ahmed',specialty:'Cardiology',photoUrl:'/img/doc1.jpg'},{fullName:'Dr. Ali Hassan',specialty:'Dermatology',photoUrl:'/img/doc2.jpg'},{fullName:'Dr. Noor Yusuf',specialty:'Pediatrics',photoUrl:'/img/doc3.jpg'}]); console.log('Seeded doctors'); process.exit(0)})()"
